name: 'Round The Seasons
description:
KNOWN ISSUES: Sometimes (reported on level 9) the game might not advance even after correctly solving the puzzle. In that case you can just use the menu to jump to the next level. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Collect seasonal items and move them to designated areas as seasons change around you in this sokoban-style puzzle game.

Made for Extra Credits Jam #3 with theme "Cycles".  

Tools used: Godot and Inkscape.

Controls:

movement: arrow keys

reset level: R

back to menu: M
